english.segment1: They say dont waste your time. You simply cannot find. An ounce of good within the heart of man
english.segment2: They say weve got to lay. In the bed weve made. And live this life without a second chance
english.segment3: But Im inclined to say. There must be something more
english.segment4: Chorus. Weve been told that the heart is just too far gone to save. But grace tells us another story. Where glory sends hopelessness away. Oh grace tells us another story
english.segment5: They say we cannot change. There is no other way. Get used it cause this is all there is.
english.segment6: They say dont raise your voice. Cause we dont have a choice. Were dealt this hand so learn to live with it
english.segment7: Well I have to believe. There must something more
english.segment9: Bridge. And though we may not understand. Why Youd give us another chance. We praise You who lets us start again
